# R Markdown

.pull-left[
[R Markdown: The Definitive Guide](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/) 

![:scale 30%](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/images/cover.png)


[bookdown: Authoring Books and Technical Documents with R Markdown](https://bookdown.org/yihui/bookdown/)

![:scale 30%](https://bookdown.org/yihui/bookdown/images/cover.jpg)


]

.pull-right[

R Markdown combines: 
* `knitr` - executes code chunks and converts from Rmd to md
* Pandoc - converts from md to any format (pdf, docx, html, ...)

Helper packages include:
* `pander` - converts R objects to markdown
* `kableExtra` - styles `knitr` tables
* `bookdown` - extends R Markdown
